backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, leadership word submissions with counting, and resilient leadership activity submissions and states.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend file changes for Activity 1 updates, anonymity notice, and submit-button text change.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all key frontend files describing recent updates to content, pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, theme provider, layout, and route definitions including the Movie References page.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Application shell with navigation, mobile menu, and authentication controls wrapping all routed content.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipWordPa: Component that loads leadership word counts and displays the top words with a bar chart-style visualization.
frontend/src/components/MicroSolutionsCo: Displays a list of micro‑solutions from the community, handling loading and empty states with labeled challenge and protective factor details.
frontend/src/components/PageSection.tsx: Provides a styled layout wrapper component that applies consistent section spacing and width constraints.
frontend/src/components/SignInGate.tsx: Blocks access to child content unless the user is authenticated via Internet Identity, offering a sign‑in prompt when needed.
frontend/src/content/movieReferences.ts: Exports an array of movie citation strings used for quote references across activities and a dedicated references page.
frontend/src/content/proposalContent.ts: Defines structured content for a proposal, including metadata, bios, abstracts, and learning outcomes.
frontend/src/content/references.ts: Exports a typed, ordered list of academic references with stable keys for display and citation use.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook for loading, storing, and managing user authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and submitting leadership words, micro‑solutions, and activity quotes through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including colors and typography settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitiesPage.tsx: Displays an overview of the two interactive activities with descriptions and links to begin each one.
frontend/src/pages/Activity1LeadershipWo: Implements Activity 1, handling user input, validation, submission of leadership words, and fetching quotes and affirmations.
frontend/src/pages/Activity2ResilientLea: Implements Activity 2, enabling users to submit resilient leadership responses with validation, error handling, and quote retrieval.
frontend/src/pages/BioPage.tsx: Renders a biography page with author details, social links, and international experience information.
Displays the list of learning outcomes sourced from proposal content.
frontend/src/pages/MovieReferencesPage.t: Displays a list of inspirational movie references using PageSection and mapped content.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Renders a hero banner, abstract, full abstract, and quick links using proposal content.
frontend/src/pages/ReferencesPage.tsx: Shows a list of research references with icons and styled containers.
frontend/src/pages/TakeawaysPage.tsx: Displays key takeaways from proposalContent in a styled list format.
frontend/src/utils/activity1Affirmations: Generates affirmation messages based on leadership word inputs using themed templates and citations.
frontend/src/utils/activity2Validation.t: Produces validation messages and aligned citations for micro-solutions using theme matching.
Maps UI challenge type keys to backend enum variants.
frontend/src/utils/quoteFormatting.ts: Converts QuoteGenre enum values into human-readable franchise labels.
frontend/src/utils/starWarsQuotes.ts: Provides a curated list of Star Wars quotes and a deterministic quote selector.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Provides a helper that converts unknown errors into user-friendly English messages with special cases for initialization, validation, network, and generic failures.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, existing features, and pending requests related to updating Activity 1 text, example words, and button labels.
